mapper.select: select * from users where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.sql: id, username, password, st, state, nick, photo, email, verification
mapper.insert: insert into users (id, username, password, st, state, nick, photo, email, verification) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{st,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into users
id,
username,

st,
state,
nick,
photo,
email,
verification,

mapper.update:
update users
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
st = #{st,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verification = #{verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
